channel.description: Recent content in Layoutanalysis on Jaidev's Blog

item.title: Misconceptions about OCR Bounding Boxes
item.description: Over the last year, I have been working on an application that auto-translates documents while maintaining the layout and formatting. It has many bells and whistles, from simple geometric tricks to sophisticated gen-AI algorithms and microservices. But basically, the app performs the simple task of identifying text in documents, machine-translating them, and reinserting them such that the output document “looks” like the input. Most documents that my app has to process are PDFs.
